resources.string: Choose the number that is higher.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points..

"Congratulations on completing the level!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the happiest number? There are 7 days of the week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes and much more. 7 is also the favorite number of most people in the world."
Choose the Roman numeral that is larger.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations on completing the level!\n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
Choose the fraction that is larger.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations on completing the level!\n Operations on fractions in the Middle Ages were considered the most difficult area of mathematics."
Choose something edible.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations on completing the level!\n Many crocodiles swallow rocks. But not because they are edible. The stones help them sink into the water faster and stay on the bottom."
Choose a pet.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations on completing the level!\n Squirrel is the best gardener. Millions of trees grow because squirrels forget where they hid the seeds."
